title: Perform Root Cause Analysis (RCA)
description: After a major failure of a gearbox, a reliability engineer leads a team to perform a formal Root Cause Analysis to prevent recurrence.

tasks.description: Gather all evidence related to the failure, including the broken parts, maintenance records, and operator interviews.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant information and data about the failure is collected.

tasks.description: Facilitate an RCA session with the team using a method like the '5 Whys' or a fishbone diagram.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team works through the analysis and identifies the physical, human, and latent root causes.

tasks.description: Document the findings and create corrective actions to address the root causes (e.g., 'update lubrication procedure', 'improve alignment standard').
tasks.expected_outcome: A set of actionable recommendations is created and assigned for implementation.
